resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/544244218</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>544244218</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770211978</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Rob's Granite Page</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Granit-Seite Des Fruchtsirups</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Page du Granit du Rob</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Página Do Granito Do Rob</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Pagina Del Granito Del Rob</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Rob σελίδα γρανίτη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Paginación Del Granito Del Robo</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Rob's Granite Page contains mineral identification in granites, pictures of various granites, general information about granite, and links to studies of granite and other igneous topics. There is extensive information on the Llano Uplift in Texas. This resource is part of the Teaching Petrology collection. http://serc.carleton.edu/NAGTWorkshops/petrology03/index.html</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Granit-Seite des Fruchtsirups enthält 
Mineralkennzeichen in den Graniten, in den Abbildungen der 
verschiedenen Granite, in den allgemeinen Informationen über Granit 
und in den Links zu den Studien des Granits und anderer Eruptivthemen.
Es gibt umfangreiche Informationen über die Llano Erhebung in 
Texas. Dieses Hilfsmittel ist ein Teil der unterrichtenden 
Petrologyansammlung 
http://serc.carleton.edu/NAGTWorkshops/petrology03/index.html</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La page du granit du rob contient l'identification
minérale dans les granits, les images de divers granits, les 
informations générales au sujet du granit, et les liens aux études 
du granit et d'autres sujets ignés. Il y a de l'information 
étendue sur le soulèvement de Llano dans le Texas. Cette 
ressource fait partie de la collection d'enseignement 
http://serc.carleton.edu/NAGTWorkshops/petrology03/index.html de 
petrology</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A página do granito do rob contem a 
identificação mineral nos granitos, nos retratos de vários 
granitos, na informação geral sobre o granito, e nas ligações aos 
estudos do granito e de outros tópicos igneous. Há uma 
informação extensiva no uplift de Llano em Texas. Este recurso
é parte da coleção ensinando 
http://serc.carleton.edu/NAGTWorkshops/petrology03/index.html da 
petrologia</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La pagina del granito del rob contiene 
l'identificazione minerale in graniti, nelle immagini di vari graniti,
nelle generalità su granito e nei collegamenti agli studi su granito 
e su altri soggetti ignei. Ci sono le vaste informazioni sul 
uplift di Llano nel Texas. Questa risorsa fa parte 
dell'accumulazione d'istruzione 
http://serc.carleton.edu/NAGTWorkshops/petrology03/index.html di 
petrology</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Rob η σελίδα γρανίτη περιέχει τον ορυκτό 
προσδιορισμό στους γρανίτες, τις εικόνες των διάφορων γρανιτών, 
τις γενικές πληροφορίες για το γρανίτη, και τις συνδέσεις με τις 
μελέτες του γρανίτη και άλλων πύρινων θεμάτων. Υπάρχουν 
εκτενείς πληροφορίες για την άνοδο Llano στο Τέξας. Αυτό
το στοιχείο συμπεριφοράς είναι μέρος της συλλογής 
http://serc.carleton.edu/NAGTWorkshops/petrology03/index.html 
πετρολογίας διδασκαλίας</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La paginación del granito del robo contiene la 
identificación mineral en granitos, los cuadros de varios granitos, 
la información de carácter general sobre el granito, y las 
conexiones a los estudios del granito y de otros asuntos ígneos. 
Hay información extensa sobre el levantamiento de Llano en 
Tejas. Este recurso es parte de la colección de enseñanza 
http://serc.carleton.edu/NAGTWorkshops/petrology03/index.html de la 
petrología</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:ROBERT REED
FN:ROBERT REED
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770211978</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>544244218</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/robs-granite-page</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
